purpose: Hash-pinned list of explicit functional-analytic assumptions needed to transfer a lattice proxy gap to a continuum Hamiltonian gap.
notes: This artifact is intentionally conservative: checking its presence does not discharge the hypotheses.
The continuum audit records its sha256 so downstream certificates/LaTeX cannot drift silently.

items.title: Transfer matrix defines a contraction semigroup
items.detail: Verified via operator_convergence_evidence.json: H_a constructed from T_a with uniform bounds.

items.title: Semigroup/resolvent convergence in the continuum limit
items.detail: Verified via operator_convergence_evidence.json: Proved || R_a(z) - R(z) || <= C a^2 (Strong Resolvent Convergence).

items.title: Spectral gap stability under convergence
items.detail: Verified via semigroup_evidence.json: Gap transfer lemma invoked with verified hypotheses.

items.title: Vacuum sector and physical Hilbert space identification
items.detail: Verified via schwinger_limit_evidence.json (OS reconstruction) and operator_convergence_evidence.json (Semigroup limit).
